title: Hungary Poses Unexpected Hurdle to Europe’s 90-Billion Euro Loan to Ukraine
summary_full: While the delay may prove to be procedural, Hungary signaled that it could cause problems as the European Union works to send money to Ukraine.
summary_public: While the delay may prove to be procedural, Hungary signaled that it could cause problems as the European Union works to send money to Ukraine.
